Platform.Title: [HuGene-2_0-st] Affymetrix Human Gene 2.0 ST Array [transcript (gene) version]
Platform.Description:
Affymetrix submissions are typically submitted to GEO using the GEOarchive method described at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/geo/info/geo_affy.html
November 15, 2012: HuGene-2_0-st-v1.na33.hg19.transcript.csv

Column.Name: total_probes
Column.Description: Total number of probes contained by this transcript cluster.

Column.Name: GB_ACC
Column.Description: GenBank and RefSeq Accessions from mrna_assignment column

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: genomic location of the transcript cluster in the version of the genome assembly used at annotation time. Coordinates are standard 1-based (length=stop-start+1).

Column.Name: RANGE_GB
Column.Description: NCBI RefSeq for chromosome of current build

Sample.Title: PC9 Untreated rep1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: 24hours post plating medium was changed to one containng 2µM HCI-2509. After 48hours, cells were harvested to isolate total RNA
Channel.Growth-Protocol: PC9 cells were cultured in DMEM media supplemented with 10% FCS. Cells were seeded out at a density of 2 x 10^6.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: RNA was exctraced using the automated isolation kit AS-1280 (Promega) in the Maxwell-16 (Promega) according to the manufacturer´s protocol.
Channel.Label: None
Channel.Label-Protocol: Biotinylated cDNA was prepared according the manufacturer´s protocol of Applause® WT-Amp ST System (NuGene®; San Carlos, USA) using 100ng of total RNA

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: 4.1µg of biotinylated cDNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on a huGene 2.0 St Array Chip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneChip Scanner G3000 7G
Sample.Description: Gene expression data from PC9 NSCLC cells
Sample.Data-Processing: The data were analyzed with Affymetrix ® Transcriptome Analysis Console using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.

Series.Title: Expression data of LUAD cell line PC9 treated with 2 uM HCI-2509 for 48 hours
Series.Summary: The epigenetic regulator LSD1 is overepxpressed in lung adenocarcinoma (LUAD). HCI-2509 a LSD1 inhibitor leads to growth arrest in in vitro tumor models. To identify the underlying molecular mechanims behind LSD1 overexpression, we examined the gene expression patterns using microarray in the LUAD cell line PC9 after HCI-2509 treatment
Series.Overall-Design: PC9 cells were treated with 2 µM HCI-2509 for 48 h. RNA was exctraced using the automated isolation kit AS-1280 (Promega) in the Maxwell-16 (Promega) with subsequent microarray hybridization.
